content.title: How can I like an article?
content.answer: To like an article, simply tap the heart icon at the bottom of the article. You can view all your liked articles in the 'Favorites' section.

content.title: How do I edit my profile?
content.answer: To edit your profile, go to the 'Profile' tab and tap the 'Edit Profile' button. From there, you can update your personal information and profile picture.

content.title: How do I switch to dark theme?
content.answer: You can switch to dark theme by going to the app settings and toggling the 'Dark Theme' option. The app will instantly switch to a darker color scheme.

content.title: How can I create an article?
content.answer: To create an article, go to the 'Create' tab and fill in the title and content fields. Once you're ready, tap 'Submit' to publish your article.

content.title: How can I rate an article?
content.answer: To rate an article, scroll to the bottom of the article and select the number of stars you wish to give. You can also leave a comment along with your rating.

content.title: What should I do if I encounter issues?
content.answer: If you encounter any issues or have questions, please contact our support team through the 'Help & Support' section in the app settings.
